name: Snow My Gosh
description:
Choose your winter ride and drive into the endless night of a snowy tundra landscape.

Snow My Gosh is an over-the-shoulder, voxel art, infinite driving game. Snow My Gosh is inspired by old school car games like Pole Position and Night Driver as well as minimalist winter games like Vlambeer's Yeti Hunter and Bob Whitehead's Skiing. I also manage to bring up Yeti and/or Bigfoot in conversation about once a week so I figured it was time to stick a Yeti-like creature in a game. This was also a great chance to build a 3D game that uses a camera perspective that I haven't worked with. After using an isometric perspective in Smash Captains, I wanted to try my hand at making a game that required a different 3D camera orientation.

GAMEPLAY
Use the left and right arrows to change lanes. Avoid enemies, collect coins to unlock up to 40 total vehicles, fill up your heart meter to get powerups, drive across a wintery landscape.

CONTROLS
left arrow: move LEFT
right arrow: move RIGHT

unlock vehicles

drive into the vast empty darkness
